game.name: White Chocolate Ice Cream Cake
game.description:
The hot summer has just begun and you are already searching for something that could cool you down. White Chocolate Ice Cream Cake brings you a wonderful opportunity to learn how to prepare a delicious ice cream cake recipe. We know that you do not miss out this opportunity and get participated into this brand new cooking game with full of excitement. The key of winning and completing the goal of the game is to pay attention to the depth details. 

We are sure that you will definitely try it out at your home after exploring all the tasks of this cute free online cooking game for girls and boys. The best thing about this cool html5 game is that you can make this recipe on your own. Start it with mixing some flour, sugar, eggs and butter into a bowl. Now take three bowls and split this mixture into them equally. Now add yellow, pink and green food coloring to each bowl. Then take a pops tray and pour the batters into it and place them in the oven to be baked until they turn into a nice golden color. 

Put some cookie mixture in a loaf tray. Also pour some white chocolate cream on top of this mixture. Dip your colourful balls in the cream. Use an ice box to put your loaf tray and leave it for cooling until you will see becoming the cream in the middle ice cream. Slice the cake into pieces and then decorate it with some fun pops. Try this recipe once at your home to fulfil your craving for something colourful, sweet and ice cold. Play the best cooking game for girls to learn the recipe of an incredible white chocolate ice cream cake!
